content.rendered:
Victory Road is the last stop in the journey to becoming Pokémon Champion. Its caverns and slopes must be navigated thoroughly in order to reach the Borrius Pokémon League.

There are a ton of trainers between the entrance and the exit, and a lot of post-game encounters and secrets to discover here as well.

Table of Contents

  • Victory Road Maps
  • Item Locations
  • Wild Pokémon
  • Trainers

Swords of Justice Final Location
Kyurem Encounter
Entrances and Exits from and within Victory Road
1F South: Route 18
Ladder Pair A: 1F Main Chamber to B1F Main Chamber
Ladder Pair B: 1F Main Chamber to 2F Main Chamber
Cave Entrance C: 2F Main Chamber to 2F Hedge Maze
Cave Entrance D: 2F Hedge Maze to 3F Main Chamber
Cave Entrance E: 3F Main Chamber to 3F Snowy Ascent
Cave Entrance F: 3F Snowy Ascent to 4F Kyurem Cave
Cave Entrance G: 3F Snowy Ascent to 4F Frozen Chamber
Ladder Pair H: 1F Main Chamber to B1F Lava Chamber
4F Frozen Chamber Exit: Pokémon League

Item Locations

Item Location Image
1F Main Chamber
Dragon Scale In the northwest corner of the chamber, at water level on a platform
Dusk Ball (hidden)
In the northeast section of the chamber, at water level, hidden in the south rock
B1F Main Chamber
Max Elixir (hidden)
In the southwest corner of the chamber, on the lower level, hidden in a rock
2F Main Chamber
Rare Candy In the middle of the chamber, north of the Pokemon Ranger
Max Revive
(hidden)		 (hidden)
In the southwest corner of the chamber, hidden in a rock
Full Restore (hidden)
In the south central part of the chamber, south of the Pokémon Ranger, hidden in a rock
Zygarde Cell In the south central part of the chamber, south of the Pokemon Ranger
2F Hedge Maze
Green Shard (hidden)
In the southern part of the route, right near the 2F cave entrance, hidden in a rock
Full Restore In the hedge maze, in the southeast corner
TM01 Focus Punch (hidden)
In the hedge maze, east of Tamer Phil and Dragon Tamer Pierce, in a dead end hidden by hedges and trees
Rare Candy (hidden)
In the hedge maze, in the central portion just south of the square long grass patch, hidden in a bush
Dragon Fang In the hedge maze, in the northwest corner, in a dead end just west of Tuber Elle and Aroma Lady Mya
Zygarde Cell In the hedge maze, in the northeast corner
3F Main Chamber
Nugget In the south part of the chamber, in a little alcove south of the three staircases
Dragon Gem (hidden)
In the southwest part of the chamber, hidden in a rock
Zygarde Cell In the southwest part of the chamber, right near Expert Beckett
Max Revive (hidden)
In the north central part of the chamber, hidden near the rocks
Razor Fang In the northeast part of the chamber, at the dead end
Dusk Ball
(hidden)		 (hidden)
In the northeast part of the chamber, near the exit to 3F Snowy Ascent
3F Snowy Ascent
Zygarde Cell On the southwest part of the ascent, north of the first stairs
Life Orb On the center part of the ascent, in the middle of the rocks
Blue Shard
(hidden)		 (hidden)
On the center part of the ascent, in the middle of the rocks, hidden in one
Moon Stone On the north part of the ascent, up a rock climb wall right near the 4F Frozen Cave entrance
Max Elixir
(hidden)		 (hidden)
On the north central part of the ascent, hidden in a rock
Full Restore
(hidden)		 (hidden)
On the central part of the ascent, hidden in a rock
TM02 Dragon Claw On the east side of the ascent, on the long grass ledge
Gengarite
(hidden)		 (hidden)
On the central east side of the ascent, east of Kyurem’s Cave, hidden in open space
4F Frozen Chamber
Protector (hidden)
In the northwest corner of the chamber, hidden in a rock
Rare Candy
(hidden)		 (hidden)
In the west central part of the chamber, just west of the entrance stairs, hidden in a rock
Ice Stone (hidden)
In the west part of the chamber, hidden in a rock
Rockium Z (hidden)
In the southeast part of the chamber, hidden in a rock
B1F Lava Chamber
Kommonium Z Inside the Raid Den chamber revealed after the Ancient Tablet puzzle gets solved
4F Kyurem Cave
PP Max On the northeast corner of Kyurem’s island
